item.title: Hug a developer today...
item.description:
Hug a developer today...

An ode to developers everywhere...

item.title: Using GitHub as a personal maven repository
item.description:
Using GitHub as a personal maven repository

Sometime you are in need for a maven repository accessible from the net which is under your control. Reasons might be: a 3rd-party lib is not on Maven central or the desired version is missing you built modules/libraries which will be included in your other projects ...
